001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension.Craftsman;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension.Epilogue;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension.Initiator;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension.Oracle;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension.Prologue;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension.RipperMan;
009import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
010import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
011import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
012import java.lang.annotation.Target;
013import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtendWith;
014
015/**
016 * Meta-annotation for managing the test execution lifecycle.
017 *
018 * <p>This annotation applies a set of predefined JUnit 5 extensions to test classes and methods,
019 * ensuring that the necessary setup, logging, and cleanup mechanisms are consistently applied.
020 *
021 * <p>By using {@code @Odyssey}, test classes automatically inherit these capabilities,
022 * creating a standardized test execution environment without requiring manual extension management.
023 *
024 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
025 */
026@ExtendWith({Oracle.class, Prologue.class, Epilogue.class, Craftsman.class, RipperMan.class, Initiator.class})
027@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
028@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.METHOD})
029public @interface Odyssey {
030
031}
